title: Bloodstone
description: Something dreadful stirs in the heart of the island nation of Tesaria. A shared dream has begun to torment people, and a dangerous magic rampages across the land. After surviving a tragedy, a young man, Jeren Dekembri, son of a village patriarch, and a young woman, Aleas Theel, flee into the lowlands, seeking safety. But there is nowhere to run, for no one can hide from the time of cataclysm that approaches.
author: Jeffrey Aaron Miller
